rows.label: tlk70000030_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm afraid this restaurant is finished - 
and so am I.

rows.label: tlk70000030_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Right after I lose my mum and dad in
Porton Village, we get attacked here
in the city?!

rows.label: tlk70000030_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I just can't stop thinking how the Grail
must have hurt my parents too, and
how terrified they must have been!

rows.label: tlk70000030_02_msg0004
rows.name:
And when I start thinking those
thoughts, I can't bring myself to do
any cooking at all.

rows.label: tlk70000030_02_msg0005
rows.name:
No cooking means no restaurant.
I just have to face up to it.
